message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth $12,000 to you. I am now extending you an exclusive offer to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $10,800. This represents a significant savings for you, allowing you to benefit from our product at a highly competitive rate. I look forward to hearing your decision soon. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information.
